tiers.description: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. The meat and ham have been diced into small pieces, and the soup has been kept on low heat till it turned milky white. The process has brought out the distinct flavors of both kinds of meat, making for an especially tasty soup.
tiers.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. One whiff is enough to whet one's appetite greatly, and the concentrated flavors fill your body with every spoonful of soup. It is almost like spreading a pair of wings and walking on clouds.
tiers.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. The inexpert heat control has caused the fresh meat to be a bit tough, and the salty ham has covered the expected taste. The bamboo shoots, which have absorbed the flavors of both meats, are probably the only acceptable part of this dish.
tiers.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: Diona's specialty. The fish skin is crisp, and the meat is sumptuous. Only someone with a sufficiently great love for fish would be able to bring out such lovely flavors. Now, if only there were something to drink to go with it... Uh-oh, she's looking this way!
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

tiers.description: A deep-fried shrimp dish. The aroma assaults your senses, while the crispy potatoes bring out the light sweetness of the shrimp meat. This, in tandem with its cute, small shape, makes it very enticing indeed.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.

tiers.description: A deep-fried shrimp dish. From the rich, indulgent scent of crispy golden potato strips, to the satisfying crunch as you take your first bite, to the grand finale of delicious sweet shrimp, this dish is pure pleasure.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.

tiers.description: A deep-fried shrimp dish. Hastily cast into hot oil and promptly forgotten about, the result is a disastrous combination of raw shrimp and burnt potato strips.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

tiers.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. Sweet stuffed lotus wrapped in a crispy, deep-fried crust. Its layers of flower petals unravel perfectly in the palm of your hand.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s.

tiers.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The flower petals waver to life if you gently blow on them. As you close your eyes and take a bite, a luscious flavor covers your tastebuds like a sweet harmony of blooming flowers and fluttering birds in the breeze.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s.

tiers.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The lotus petals have lost their original color, turning brown and wilted under the merciless heat of hot oil.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s.

tiers.description: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. Not only is the pickled meat within deeply flavorful, but the meringue has also maintained its sweetness and moisture through the baking process. This dish is not to be missed at any festival in Mondstadt.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% and DEF by 200 for 300s.

tiers.description: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. As you cut a slice off this small meat pie, the aromas of butter and meat assault your senses simultaneously. The rustic, sweet mouthfeel reminds you of the sights and sounds of harvest festivals, bringing a smile unbidden to your face.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% and DEF by 235 for 300s.

tiers.description: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. The burnt-yellow meringue looks barely passable. Don't let any Mondstadt locals see you dead with this thing, or they might just take it upon themselves to ensure that you never fail again.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% and DEF by 165 for 300s.

tiers.description: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat goes down smooth, its flavor dense, and when cut open, the meat juice that flows out bears traces of apple flavoring. An eye-popping, refreshing dish indeed.
tiers.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat is juicy in the extreme, and no matter how much of it you eat, you still want more. The way every breath you take is tinged with the flavor of apples reminds you of nothing so much as lying in an apple orchard.
tiers.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A dish with braised meat and apples. Apart from a slight sourness, it tastes just like any other down-to-earth braised meat dish, and lacks any fruity aroma. One might even wonder if the apples were put in there at all.
tiers.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: Xinyan's specialty. Its demonic appearance hides an absolutely demonic spiciness. Eat it, tear up, eat some more, and don't stop till you drop! Surely only a demon could have invented such a dish!
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 16% for 300s

tiers.description: Zhongli's specialty. The ham is a butt end selected according to Yuehai Pavilion's gourmet standards. The fresh meat is pork belly, freshly hunted in Springvale, while the bamboo shoots are the densest you'll find in Qingce Village. It is then heated, slowly, gently, and with the utmost care and technique... Such a "particular" taste may only be shared with those who know how to appreciate it.
tiers.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: A braised meat dish. The cut of meat is a happy medium between lean and fatty, and has been braised to smoking perfection. The ingredients glisten, and are soft but not greasy. Word has it that the Tianshu of a certain generation of the Liyue Qixing invented this dish after much painstaking development.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 30% and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s.

tiers.description: A braised meat dish. Its intense aroma can be detected from miles away. The ingredients look exquisite in every way, capturing the essence of its original design. It would not look out of place on a gourmet spread at Yuehai Pavilion.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 45% and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s.

tiers.description: A braised meat dish. It's been braised for too long, resulting in meat that's too soft. The fatty cuts are greasy enough to give you palpitations, and you can barely scarf them down even when wrapped in the Qingxin leaves.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 25% and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s.

tiers.description: A neatly arranged dish. The ham, fowl, and bamboo shoots have been sliced into threads of equal length, and they've been laid out neatly in the soup bowl after being steamed at high heat, before being covered in consommé. The layers are distinct, and the mouthfeel is salty yet fresh.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Shield strength by 25% for 300s.

tiers.description: A neatly arranged dish. The evenly-sized threads reveal exquisite knife-work. Rather than a dish, this seems more like a work of art. But once you work up the wherewithal to pick up those chopsticks and have at it, the delicious flavors will be utter bliss — leaving this as a mere work of art would be such a shame.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Shield strength by 30% for 300s.

tiers.description: A neatly arranged dish. It certainly looks the part, but tasting it reveals the blandness of the consommé. Was it diluted too much, perhaps?
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Shield strength by 20% for 300s.

tiers.description: Diluc's specialty. Feast your eyes and then your stomach upon this delicacy as the soft ribs melt in your mouth. Who knew Diluc was able to cook this well?
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% and CRIT DMG by 20% for 300s.

tiers.description: A rich, meaty dish. Originally a Mondstadt dish made of steaks, potatoes, and cheese, it has since become synonymous with Ludi Harpastum.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s.

tiers.description: A rich, meaty dish. Piled in just the right way to be both aesthetically pleasing and delicious all the way through. I wonder if we can pile it a little higher...
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s.

tiers.description: A rich, meaty dish. The meat must have been stacked wrong... Yeah, that's it. Now, can this actually be served...?
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s.

tiers.description: Venti's specialty. Other than the Cecilia flowers used for decoration, the ingredients are no different from normal. But if you taste it carefully, you can taste the flavor of "a wind that brings hope and tiny twists of fate." Perhaps...this is exactly what he wants.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1,800s.

tiers.description: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine, in which specially selected ingredients are submerged and slowly bowled into soup stock. The recipe scribbled from memory alone was enough to urge the adepti to once again return to the world of men.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 316 and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s.

tiers.description: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine. This dish is a rare and exquisite mix of both land and sea, combining countless delicious delicacies in one flavor-filled pot. Each mouthful is a moment to remember — it's even irresistible enough to entice the adepti down from their celestial abode.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 372 and CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s.

tiers.description: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine. Without having mastered the art of simmering, the resulting stew-like dish has a salty, fishy taste. But, just considering the costly ingredients will be enough to keep you going until the pot's empty.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 260 and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s.

tiers.description: Xingqiu's specialty. This dish's almost artisan appearance makes one almost reluctant to tuck in. But once you get a taste, its fresh, light and lovely sweetness will make the dish hard to put down.... Hang on a moment. Did he throw the carrots out, by any chance?
tiers.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: A dessert made out of almond. It has a silky-smooth texture with a long-lasting aroma of almond. It's named tofu only because of its tofu-like shape.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s.

tiers.description: A dessert made from ground almonds. It has the exquisite look and texture of that of a piece of white jade, and could pass as an art piece — so much so that you could not entertain the idea of actually eating it.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s.

tiers.description: A dessert made from ground almonds. The almond milk is chilled without being properly ground and strained. You can only lie to yourself that its rough texture is what makes it special.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 66 for 300s.

tiers.description: A simple chowder with a long history. The ingredients are similarly traditional and simple. No matter where you are, a piping-hot chowder of this sort can always give you a sense of real and unsurpassed satisfaction.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s.

tiers.description: A simple chowder with a long history. After much careful stewing, the flavors of three different vegetables have been blended to perfection. Like this, it is not hard to imagine why someone once called it "the best chowder I've ever tasted."
tiers.effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s.

tiers.description: A simple chowder with a long history. Though the Anemo Archon is said to symbolize freedom, perhaps this dish has been a bit too liberal in the making. Perhaps the name Stormy Stew might be more fitting here.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s.

tiers.description: A poached fish dish. The fresh and tasty fish fillets are tender and juicy. The secret to this recipe is adding powdered Violetgrass into the heated oil to give the dish that aromatic scent. It's spicy, but not too spicy.
tiers.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: A poached fish dish. The fish fillets are so tender and juicy that they almost seem to come alive in your mouth. The sense of loss is so unbearable when you swallowed a piece down that you just had to treat yourself to another piece.
tiers.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: A poached fish dish. It has essentially lost all the taste of fish itself to the spicy taste of chili peppers. Only a selected few enjoy such a sensory overload on their tongues.
tiers.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: A balanced combination of seafood. The delicacy of crab and mint make for a clear soup, and the calla lily brings it a refreshing taste.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s.

tiers.description: A balanced combination of seafood. The crab, mint and calla lily come together perfectly to dance on your tongue. It reminds you of playing barefoot by the lake in summer.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s.

tiers.description: A balanced combination of seafood. The bitterness of the calla lily, the astringency of the mint, the fishiness of the crab... Getting all the negatives together like this takes skill.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s.

tiers.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. Fresh poultry is complimented by fragrant mushrooms. Don't be picky, chow down!
tiers.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. All the best the wild has to offer are pierced on just one stick.
tiers.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. At first glance it's hard to tell which is which.
tiers.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A plate of cold cut meat. An equal balance of bacon, ham and sausage keeps everyone happy.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 30% for 300s.

tiers.description: A plate of cold cut meat. The seasoning is just delightful enough to bring out the flavors perfectly. With a mouth full of meaty ecstasy, one worries about nothing.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 40% for 300s.

tiers.description: A plate of cold cut meat. Seems a little too cold, probably not good for those with bad teeth or sensitive stomachs.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20% for 300s.

tiers.description: Chongyun's specialty. Though these springy noodles would be irresistible in the sweltering summer, Chongyun insists on dining on them even in the chattering cold of winter. What a guy.
tiers.effect: Restores 80 Stamina.

tiers.description: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. There is no great refinement in the making of this food, and it appears in Liyue often during festival season. Whenever this dish is served up, the person at the head of the table will invite everyone to dig in, saying "Come on, eat, eat," hence the name.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s.

tiers.description: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. The mixture of meat and vegetables is spot-on, the presentation is flawless, and the blend of flavors in the broth brings out the best of everything. Don't mind if I do.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s.

tiers.description: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients... dumped into scalding-hot water and boiled beyond recognition. As if the taste of everything and nothing at the same time isn't bad enough, you'll want to watch out for the sand, too...
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s.

tiers.description: A luxurious bake. Cracks through the golden outer skin reveal a medley of rosy ham and bright vegetables. How tantalizing!
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.

tiers.description: A luxurious bake. The scent is so rich and heavenly. You'll only be done once you lick the plate clean.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.

tiers.description: A somewhat luxurious looking bake. By looking at it, no one can tell what it is made of... or what it lacks.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

tiers.description: A meat and vegetable stew. The thick juices taste great with the tender meat and vegetables.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s.

tiers.description: A meat and vegetable stew. These warm, buttery ingredients are so good that you almost want to dive into the cream stew and cuddle up with them.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s.

tiers.description: A meat and vegetable stew. Surprisingly dry for something that's meant to have liquid.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s.

tiers.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The stuffing is taken from whole fresh shrimp, and the glistening quality of the flour can be guessed at from the translucence of the outer skin. Has a springy, tasty chew.
tiers.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The outer skin is as clear as its crystal namesake, and when it enters the mouth, one's tongue could be forgiven for thinking that the fresh shrimp within is still alive. Those who eat it can only lament that four pieces per serving is far, far too few.
tiers.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The dull outer skin has a rather sticky mouthfeel which, when combined with the dry stuffing within, makes this dish a torment best ended sooner.
tiers.effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: Mona's specialty. A great work from a great astrologer. Its greatest aspect lies with its cost-effectiveness in filling one's stomach.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 16% for 300s.

tiers.description: Fischl's specialty. The exquisite presentation doth seem to communicate some incomprehensible enigma. When partaking, if one were to gaze upon Fischl, one might see her expectant gaze peek though the gaps of her fingers, which she is using to cover half her face... Is this also part of the mystery?
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 55% for 300s.

tiers.description: Klee's specialty. By way of apology for wantonly using her bombs to scare away the fish, Jean instructed Klee to make this toast for the fishermen. It's filling and tasty. Klee will never starve again, even after a whole day of blast fishing.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 151 for 300s.

tiers.description: Onion-covered toast. A favorite amongst fishermen, they will stuff a bag with it and sit by the river all day.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 107 for 300s.

tiers.description: Onion-covered toast. Exudes a wonderful aroma. Are the fish biting for the bait, or is it the toast they're after?
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 126 for 300s.

tiers.description: Onion-covered toast. Not quite cooked right. You'll notice its imperfection, even if you eat it while fishing.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 88 for 300s.

tiers.description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The meaty, herby aroma really gets your appetite going.
tiers.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The beautiful, authentic flavors take you on a culinary adventure from the first bite to the last.
tiers.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. A bit chewy and annoyingly sticks to your teeth.
tiers.effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: Beidou's specialty. They say that Beidou once learned some tricks from Xiangling, making some refinements and adding more flavor to this dish. If you can clean it out in one go, perhaps you might impress her.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

tiers.description: Fried Radish Balls. Fragrant and crispy. Make sure to eat them while they're hot! Said to be a recipe from Liyue.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s.

tiers.description: Fried Radish Balls. It's insane that something so delicious comes from plain old radishes! All who eat them will truly understand Liyue's culinary reputation.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s.

tiers.description: Fried Radish Balls. Way too oily, and leaves you looking for something to drink to cut through the grease.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 66 for 300s.

tiers.description: Kaeya's specialty. A chewy skewer with a rich sweet aftertaste.Wait...Is this really the smell of fruit?
tiers.effect: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The crab has been chopped into pieces and battered with flour, before being stir-fried till golden and rich with flavor. It is worthy of the word "gold," whether in terms of appearance or quality.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 261 and healing effects by 8% for 300s.

tiers.description: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The aroma of the crab meat inundates the room the instant it leaves the frying pan, and a single bite fills one's palate with the countless rustic flavors of a fishing village hometown. It seems that such simple yet timeless village customs held the secret to this lavish, golden sumptuousness all along.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 308 and healing effects by 10% for 300s.

tiers.description: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The flour granules within have congealed like gravel, and have some crab shell mixed in. But compared to the blandness of the crab meat, the taste of crab shell is at least worth having a go at.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 215 and healing effects by 6% for 300s.

tiers.description: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The fish is a fresh catch straight from the harbor, lightly picked and swiftly grilled. Its aroma attracts the street cats. Indeed, freshness is the secret of flavor.
tiers.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The shimmering golden skin has locked the fresh and tender meat in. You cannot help but sigh in satisfaction as you chew on it. Not a scrap of meat here will go uneaten, not even those stuck firmly to the bamboo stick.
tiers.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. You can barely see that this charred lump is indeed grilled fish, and upon further investigation, the fish scales mixed in confirm that this is indeed the case.
tiers.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: Jean's specialty. This pizza almost seems more art than food. Just one slice is enough to have you raring to go. Is this what keeps Jean working so hard?
tiers.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: An exquisite-looking dish. The ham's sweetness is locked inside the fresh vegetables, drizzled with a spicy broth. Delicious is an understatement.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 272 and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s.

tiers.description: An exquisite-looking dish. The sweetness of ham and the crisp lotus seeds are a match made in heaven. The aromatic broth pours down like the dawning light, caressing your tongue with an unworldly delicious taste.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 320 and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s.

tiers.description: An exquisite-looking dish. Food ingredients of different degrees of doneness are wrapped in shriveled vegetables. It looks depressing to say the least.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 224 and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s.

tiers.description: A simple vegetable soup. Snapdragon, tofu, and lotus seeds are put into boiling water and simmered. Jewelry Soup earned its luxurious name from the look of the ingredients used, but contrary to its name, the soup is commonly prepared and served in ordinary households.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 107 for 300s.

tiers.description: A simple vegetable soup. The mild-tasting soup is filled with the fragrance of fresh vegetables. This down-to-earth and heart-warming soup can rival any luxurious dish.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 126 for 300s.

tiers.description: A simple vegetable soup. The bland soup and dull vegetables remind you of the dying vegetables on abandoned and barren farmlands.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 88 for 300s.

tiers.description: Cold chicken mixed in dressings. The finesse technique used in mixing the dish retained the freshness of the delightful juice contained within the chicken. The glowing gold chicken skin hides a mildly hot flavor underneath.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 9% for 300s.

tiers.description: Cold chicken mixed in dressings. The chicken is extremely tender, juicy, and sweet. The delicious taste transports you to the realm of dreams.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s.

tiers.description: Cold chicken mixed in dressings. The chicken probably isn't properly marinated, so it's only salty on the outside but bland on the inside. The taste reminds you of water-poached chicken breasts.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s.

tiers.description: Noelle's specialty. These thick pastries are the special afternoon snacks of the Knights of Favonius. They give people the sense that they have fallen upon a layer of fluffy clouds, and seeing Noelle's smile makes the feeling all the sweeter!
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

name: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup

tiers.description: A steaming egg dish. The clear, gold colors of the egg custard have been embellished with several lotus roots. Regardless of whether it is breakfast or a post-meal snack, its superior nutritional value can greatly nourish the body.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s.

tiers.description: A steaming egg dish. The succulent eggs melt right in your mouth, and before you know it, a smooth and subtle sweetness of newly sprung lotus flowers covers your tastebuds.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s.

tiers.description: A steaming egg dish. The lengthy steaming process has caused unusual honeycomb figure to appear on the surface of the egg custard. It goes without saying that there isn't hardly a hint of bitterness left in the lotus.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s.

tiers.description: A pan-fried meat dish. Ground meat is put on the Matsutake and gently pan-fried on low heat so the Matsutake can fully take in the aromatic juice of the meat. It's a mouthwatering delicacy in all of its glory.
tiers.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A pan-fried meat dish. It combines the essences of the mountains and the nourishments of the celestial bodies. It is a very nutritious dish that will surely bring a smile to your face.
tiers.effect: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A pan-fried meat dish. Though the dry and tough texture is miles away from what it could be, the Matsutake is too nutritious to let it go to waste.
tiers.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, making it completely dry and crispy. The sprinkled pepper on top brings out the freshness of the fish.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

tiers.description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, locking the delicious juices inside the meat under the crispy skin. A small bite is all that's needed to unlock its wondrous and delicious taste.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

tiers.description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire. Sadly, it's a bit too well done. The charred smell and the dry texture are not too impressive.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

tiers.description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. A little bit of pinecone helps give it a nice crunch, and great with a bit of jam. Loved by people of all ages.
tiers.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. Close your eyes and feel the mild breeze and sweet dew that Mondstadt offers.
tiers.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. It's said that a hash brown without jam is not worthy of the Mondstadt name... But is this even a hash brown?
tiers.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside of a pastry. When you split the pastry in two, minced meat spills out. The taste of meat grease is all but gone, and the baking process has brought out the sweetness of the pastry. Such pastries are usually stamped with the word "Mora," all the better to represent wealth and fortune.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

tiers.description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside of a pastry. With a crispy crust and tender meat, this legendary delicacy is so succulent that not even Mora laid in front of you could distract you from enjoying it.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

tiers.description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside of a pastry. The tough pastry shell almost seems to sally out against your teeth as you bite into it. If you fight through the greasiness and only chew on the minced meat, you can sort of taste its flavor.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

tiers.description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. When still warm the cheese stretches out long, making it extremely satisfying to eat.
tiers.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. It's a party in your mouth and the cheese and mushrooms invited all their delicious friends.
tiers.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. If you can bite through the brick-like texture... At least it can ease your hunger.
tiers.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: Lisa's specialty. With an inexplicable aurora, this bolognese is so exotic that you can never have enough. Did she actually enchant it with some kind of magic?
tiers.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: Qiqi's specialty. The neat rows of ingredients seem at once exotic and delicious, and Baizhu says that Qiqi has spent a long time creating this dish. Still, once one considers that Qiqi has no sense of taste, just putting chopsticks to the food is going to take some courage.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% and CRIT DMG by 20% for 300s.

tiers.description: Noodles in a meat-and-vegetable sauce. The sauce has a rustic flavor, and there's a generous amount of it mixed in with the noodles. A humble but enduringly popular dish.
tiers.effect: Restores 50 Stamina.

tiers.description: Noodles in a meat-and-vegetable sauce. The seemingly ordinary noodles has absorbed the essence of the mountainous delicacies. A single mouthful is enough to taste its extreme freshness.
tiers.effect: Restores 60 Stamina.

tiers.description: Noodles in a meat-and-vegetable sauce. The moisture has been sucked right out of this dish, causing the noodles to become dry. You might choke on them even if you chew slowly.
tiers.effect: Restores 40 Stamina.

tiers.description: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. A staple for Northerners, often made for honored guests.
tiers.effect: Restores 50 Stamina.

tiers.description: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. A dish fit for a king. Go on, find one and serve him with pride.
tiers.effect: Restores 60 Stamina.

tiers.description: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. It's true. You really ought to try your own cooking before serving it to your guests. It's not too late to make a new one, perhaps?
tiers.effect: Restores 40 Stamina.

tiers.description: Sucrose's specialty. It looks like some strange alchemical product at first, but Sucrose insists that it is a healthy and nutritious meal, the result of many experiments and painstaking improvements. Its healthy green color comes from a mix of cream and natural vegetable juices... Wait, vegetable juices?
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 20% of Max HP, then restores an additional 1,500 HP.

tiers.description: Amber's specialty. One side is obviously uncooked. The other side gives off a subtle scent of something burnt. Close your eyes and have a big mouthful, just to keep Amber happy if nothing else.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

tiers.description: Razor's specialty. Carefully shaped to resemble a wolf's paw. You can really feel the effort he has put into trying human cooking.
tiers.effect: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: Ningguang's specialty. The pastry is perfectly soft and waxy, as is the consistency of the meat, and the honey-like meat juices ooze out as you squeeze it. Wherever did the high and mighty Tianquan Lady Ningguang learn to make this dish?
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

tiers.description: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. They say it was originally just a rustic dish that everyone in Qingce Village knew how to make. But quite unexpectedly, its crispy and spicy dishes gained the recognition of people from elsewhere, and thus began to spread throughout the Liyue region.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s.

tiers.description: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. Just catching a whiff is enough to work up one's appetite. The tingle of chili titillates the tongue, leaving you ready to devour ten bowls in a single sitting.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s.

tiers.description: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. This one was a failed test run, being unpleasantly bitter and uncomfortably spicy. You could try mixing it with rice - or you could simply discard it and eat the rice instead.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s.

tiers.description: Radish-based vegetable soup. Its flavor is delicately between tart and sweet. With luscious radish, it's a well-balanced dish.
tiers.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: Radish-based vegetable soup. The clear aromas are perfectly accompanied by a sunny summer afternoon.
tiers.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: Radish-based vegetable soup. The vegetables within appear to have been victims of a frost.
tiers.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 210 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: A vegetable salad. Not just steamed potatoes and fresh vegetables, but also a hard-boiled egg to top it off. Satisfying to both the eyes and stomach.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT rate by 9% for 300s.

tiers.description: A vegetable salad. Fresh, light and varied. You'd never get tired of eating this, even if you had to eat it for the rest of your life.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT rate by 12% for 300s.

tiers.description: A vegetable salad. Regrettably, it seems the best time to plate the potatoes and boiled eggs was missed.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT rate by 6% for 300s.

tiers.description: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. Cooked in butter, it's crisp outside yet tender inside. Eat it before someone steals it from you.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s.

tiers.description: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. So smooth and fragrant, eating them is like having the bursting vitality of spring absorbed into your stomach.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s.

tiers.description: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. A shame that control of the fire was lost. Best you can do now is try to trick people who didn't see you cooking it into thinking they are just potato chips.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s.

tiers.description: Barbara's specialty. Carrots cut into cute little stars make this dish... Wait, AHH, where did this spiciness come from!?
tiers.effect: Decreases Stamina depleted by sprinting for all party members by 25% for 1,500s.

tiers.description: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. The fish is first completely deboned before crisscross cuts are made on the skin. The fish is then coated in flour and deep-fried to a golden-brown color, then served with ketchup drizzled on top. It is tender and juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside. The dish resembles a squirrel's tail to a certain degree, hence the name.
tiers.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. The fish is expertly handled to exhibit an elegant shape; however, the exquisitely balanced sweet-and-sour taste is really where the dish truly comes alive. The culinary skills involved in preparing this dish can impress even the greatest chefs of Liyue.
tiers.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. Sure, you can make out the shape of the fish, but you can't see how it's related to any squirrel. It just proves that the more complicated the dish is to prepare, the harder it is to prepare it well.
tiers.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A grilled steak. High heat has locked the juices in, giving one high expectations for when the meat is cut open.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

tiers.description: A grilled steak. Juicy, flavorsome, fragrant steak. One bite and you feel yourself come alive.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

tiers.description: A grilled steak. Its color is a little bleak, almost as if it feels sorry for itself for being a sorry excuse for a steak.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

tiers.description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The carrots take the gamey edge off the meat, and the sauce brings it all together sweetly. The perfect warm dish for a cold winter night.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party member's climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s.

tiers.description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The warm honey draws out the flavor of the meat, creating a flavor explosion akin to bathing in the warm summer sun.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party member's climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s.

tiers.description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The sauce has stuck like glue to the meat, forming a homogeneous mass that tastes neither of honey nor meat.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party member's climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s.

tiers.description: Sliced meat flash-fried in a wok. The mild Jueyun Chili adds just the right amount of kick to the delicious aroma of the meat. Perfect as an appetizer and also goes well with rice.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

tiers.description: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat. The spiciness is as a blaze amidst a field of snow that ignites your appetite and leaves you craving more.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

tiers.description: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat — but for so long that they are now indistinguishable from the accompanying Jueyun Chili. Best served with rice, if served at all.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

tiers.description: Keqing's specialty. This dish was not grilled. Instead, it was fried from within through the delicate application of Electro. A gentle bite reveals fragrant fish under the lightly-charred skin, its taste perfectly balanced. So, is this how she survives in the wild? You really can't judge a book by its cover.
tiers.effect: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: Honey-roasted fowl. The honey and sweet flowers come together to compliment the tender fowl meat.
tiers.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: Honey-roasted fowl. Tender and sweet, the meat has perfectly fused with the honey, ensuring the only thing left of this dish will be the cleanly-picked bones.
tiers.effect: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: Honey-roasted fowl. The sweet flowers have been burnt off, revealing the bitter taste of the overcooked fowl.
tiers.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP to the selected character.

tiers.description: A stack of round pancakes. A staple originating from afternoon tea in manors. Only the best berries should be picked for this dish.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

tiers.description: A stack of round pancakes. Tender and fluffy, the sweet-smelling pancakes taste like clouds. A heavenly delicacy, no doubt.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.

tiers.description: A stack of round pancakes. A burnt scent masks what you can only assume should be a sweet taste. The berries are the only thing saving this dish.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.

tiers.description: Bennett's specialty. For some reason, every single fried egg is a little burnt around the edges. That said, the burnt crisp does lend a whole new flavor to the dish.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

tiers.description: An egg fried on one side. The yolk flows out nicely when broken. So satisfying.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

tiers.description: An egg fried on one side. With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

tiers.description: An egg fried on one side. A bit hard in the middle. One can only hope it still has its nutrients.
tiers.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

tiers.description: Xiangling's specialty. This is the signature dish of the Wanmin Restaurant, combining Xiangling's heartfelt passion for cuisine. Anyone who tastes it will gain a pure appreciation for gourmet food amid the hearty and addictive blend of flavors.
tiers.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Though it contains animal organ meat and bits and scraps of other things, the strong-flavored seasonings have masked the stench of the meat. Many have had this dish for the entirety of their lives without knowing "chop suey" is actually a swear word in the local language.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s.

tiers.description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. The authentic "Liyue taste" of this aromatic dish makes it a comfort food for golden-agers that may bring a tear to their eyes.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s.

tiers.description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Even if the dish was extremely delicious, it surely doesn't look the part. Even the most popular stalls would have trouble selling this.
tiers.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s.

tiers.description: Crisp and fragrant. Delicious raw or made into wine.
tiers.effect: Restores 300 HP.

tiers.description: A freshly squeezed, fashionable, and fruity non-alcoholic beverage. Said to have a strong sobering effect, tavern patrons often order this as the last drink of the night.
tiers.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: A freshly squeezed, fashionable, and fruity non-alcoholic beverage. A refreshing burst of Mint with Berries to sweeten the deal, it has an exquisite aroma.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 16% for 300s.

tiers.description: A bottle of clear, colorless, and contaminant-free liquid. Indistinguishable from ordinary spring water. May or may not be worth putting all of one's hopes into.
Tea from Liyue. After a grueling trek around the vast region of Liyue, there's nothing more rejuvenating than a big swig of tea from Pop's Teas.
tiers.effect: Restores 14% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 350 HP every 5s for 30s.

tiers.description: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.
tiers.effect: Restores 300 HP.

tiers.description: A freshly squeezed, fashionable, and fruity non-alcoholic beverage. Iced Wolfhook juice mixed with a pinch of other ingredients, forming a dreamy shade of violet.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 114 for 300s.

tiers.description: A kind of potion that boosts Hydro RES and makes one able to withstand highly humid environments. It is said to act like a desiccant and be highly effective at keeping items dry. It can also be ingested for the same effect.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Hydro RES by 25% for 300s.

tiers.description: A potion that boosts Geo RES and keeps one from getting bothered by sand and dust. It has a strange taste not unlike that of magnets. It keeps a traveler clean from all the sand and dust out there.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Geo RES by 25% for 300s.

tiers.description: Grants greater affinity for Pyro, boosting Pyro DMG. It is made of materials that gestate Pyro, which serves to draw in Pyro energy more effectively. It also makes the user more fired-up and passionate.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Pyro DMG by 25% for 300s.

tiers.description: Grants greater affinity for Cryo, boosting Cryo DMG. It has a chilling sensation when applied, and helps one to better channel Cryo energy. It also helps to keep you cool-headed and calm.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Cryo DMG by 25% for 300s.

tiers.description: A miraculous potion that boosts Cryo RES and makes one able to withstand extreme cold. Induces a chilling sensation when drank, but once this sensation spreads throughout the body, the feeling of being cold disappears.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Cryo RES by 25% for 300s.

tiers.description: Grants greater affinity for Anemo, boosting Anemo DMG. It has a fragrant smell. It is said that using it during your travels will make you walk as if you're riding on the wind.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Anemo DMG by 25% for 300s.

tiers.description: A miraculous potion that boosts Pyro RES and makes one able to withstand high heat. It works not by cooling the body, but by helping the body acclimate to high temperatures.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Pyro RES by 25% for 300s.

tiers.description: A potion that boosts Electro RES and keeps one from getting electro-shocked. Induces a tingling sensation when drank. It is said to work by filling the body with inversely charged electrical energy, which counteracts the effect of Electro damage.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Electro RES by 25% for 300s.

tiers.description: Grants greater affinity for Electro, boosting Electro DMG. It induces a tingling sensation on the skin and renders the user better able to better channel Electro energy - but comes with a risk of causing an electrical fire that would definitely ruin your perfect hair.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Electro DMG by 25% for 300s.

tiers.description: Grants greater affinity for Hydro, boosting Hydro DMG. It's a slippery medicine for external use, able to better channel Hydro energy. It has a subtle fragrance.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Hydro DMG by 25% for 300s.

tiers.description: Grants greater affinity for Geo, boosting Geo DMG. You can feel the fine Geo pellets within when applied. It's said to help with physical injuries.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Geo DMG by 25% for 300s.

tiers.description: A mysterious potion that boosts Anemo RES and makes one able to withstand strong winds. It works wonders for adventurers out in the world and is even said to keep the cold away.
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Anemo RES by 25% for 300s.

tiers.description: Yelan's specialty. Amongst the ingredients here is the new tea, Dipped Dew, delivered from Qiaoying Village right to the Teahouse, which was then quickly fried together with freshly-caught river shrimp. The look is sightly, the scent of distant tea, and the taste both tender and springy... Wait a moment. Why's she coming over with that plate of chilli?
tiers.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% for 300s.

tiers.description: Kuki Shinobu's specialty. The soft egg skin almost seems to dance upon a stage made from sauce, with fluffy rice wrapped under its swaying skirt. This would even be a match for the work of Uyuu Restaurant's head chef. Truly, Shinobu's chef license was not earned in vain.
tiers.effect: Decreases Stamina depleted by climbing and sprinting for all party members by 25% for 900s.
